participant_abstract.sent: I got a sufficient opportunity to discuss my role with my team members and to introduce myself.
I believe that the meeting was successfull in this regard.
However, there does not seem to have arisen a proper demarkation between roles at this point.
For example, there is no clear demarkation between my role and the role of the user-interface designer.

participant_actions.sent: Identification of responsibilities for the functional design phase.
Explore the options that will make the product desirable and useful.

participant_decisions.sent: Identification of constraints for design of product: - trendy, user-friendly and origninal.
Total profit from all sales: 50 M euros .

participant_problems.sent: No problems were identified during the meeting.
